>
[Basic Concoction](/Feats.aspx?ID=666) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 220 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [alchemist feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=1/feats).

<title level="2">Basic Concoction leads to...</title>
[Advanced Concoction](/Feats.aspx?ID=668)
name: Basic Concoction
